## Checklist

### Required for ALL PRs

- [ ] **CHANGELOG.md** updated with changes
- [ ] **activeContext.md** updated with current state
- [ ] **progress.md** updated with task status
- [ ] Code follows project conventions (see `techContext.md`)
- [ ] Self-review completed

### If Bug Fix

- [ ] **mistakes.md** entry added with:
  - Symptom
  - Root cause
  - Fix description
  - Guardrail (test/lint rule/type constraint)
- [ ] Regression test added (or reason documented)

### If Architecture Change

- [ ] **ADR created** in `docs/adr/`
- [ ] **architecture/overview.md** updated (if system flow changed)

### If New Feature

- [ ] Acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Edge cases considered
- [ ] Error handling implemented
